text: Tamen [youtai jiaotu he jidu jiaotu] she an la er ba tamen de la bi, xiushi he ma'er ya zhizi [zhu] ma xi ha dang zhuzai chongbai, jinguan tamen [zai “tao la te” he “yin ji lei” zhong] fengming zhi chongbai du yi de zhu [an la], chu ta [an la] wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu. Zanmei ta chaojue! Ta yu tamen suo chongbai de ouxiang shi hao wu guanxi de.
